caption.p: SEM images showing the morphology and the distribution of spheroidized cementite in 0.10C-1.50Cr steel after different processes: Spherodizing annealing ( a), cold rolling ( b), annealing ( c), cold drawing ( d), recrystallization annealing ( e), and stress-relief annealing ( f). Statistical results reveal the size and ratio of larger particles ( g).
